/Overlays --><div id="highlight-background"></div><!-- Preload Screen --><div id="preload-wrapper" class="wrapper loaded" style="display: none;"><div class="logo-wrapper"><span class="wicon wicon-metro"></span><!-- <img src="/arquivos/mtf-metrofood-logo-preload.png?v=636567204252530000" class="logo" /> --></div><div class="loader"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="preload-loader" width="60px" height="60px" viewBox="0 0 80 80"><path class="preload-loader-circlebg" d="M40,10C57.351,10,71,23.649,71,40.5S57.351,71,40.5,71 S10,57.351,10,40.5S23.649,10,40.5,10z"/><path id="preload-loader-circle" class="preload-loader-circle" d="M40,10C57.351,10,71,23.649,71,40.5S57.351,71,40.5,71 S10,57.351,10,40.5S23.649,10,40.5,10z" style="stroke-dashoffset: 0; stroke-dasharray: 192.617;"/></svg></div></div><script type="text/javascript">
	;(function() {
		/*
		|--------------------------------------------------------------------------
		| PRELOAD
		|--------------------------------------------------------------------------
		*/
		var preloadInit = function() {
			var preloadedScreen = Fizzmod.Utils.getCookie('preloaded-screen')

			if (preloadedScreen) {
				$('#preload-wrapper').hide()
			} else {
				Fizzmod.Utils.setCookie('preloaded-screen', 1, 1)
			}

			var callcenterStoreCookie = Fizzmod.Utils.getCookie('callcenter-store')
			if (callcenterStoreCookie) {
				// Set label in header
				$(document).ready(function() {
					$('#active-store-name-label').text(callcenterStoreCookie)
				})

				$('#preload-wrapper, #store-locality').hide()
			}

			if ($('#preload-wrapper').length != 0) preloadStart() // If preload exist show animation
		}

		var preloadStart = function(start) {
			var PathLoader = function(el) {
				this.el = el
				// clear stroke
				this.el.style.strokeDasharray = this.el.style.strokeDashoffset = this.el.getTotalLength()
			}
			PathLoader.prototype._draw = function(val) {
				this.el.style.strokeDashoffset = this.el.getTotalLength() * (1 - val)
			}
			PathLoader.prototype.setProgress = function(val) {
				this._draw(val)
			}
			PathLoader.prototype.setProgressFn = function(fn) {
				if (typeof fn === 'function') {
					fn(this)
				}
			}

			var progress = 0
			var simulationFn = function(instance) {
				var interval = setInterval(function() {
					progress = Math.min(progress + Math.random() * 0.1, 1)
					instance.setProgress(progress)

					// reached the end
					if (progress === 1) {
						clearInterval(interval)
						preloadEnd()
					}
				}, 100)
			}

			var loaderInnerCircle = $('#preload-loader-circle')
			var loader = new PathLoader(loaderInnerCircle[0])

			$(document).on('animationend webkitAnimationEnd', '#preload-wrapper .loader', function(event) {
				if (event.originalEvent.animationName == 'animInitialHeader') {
					start = false
					loader.setProgressFn(simulationFn)
				}
				if (event.originalEvent.animationName == 'animLoadedLoader') {
					setTimeout(function() {
						$('#preload-wrapper').hide()
					}, 200)
				}
			})

			if (start) {
				progress = 0
				loader.setProgressFn(simulationFn)
			}
		}

		var preloadEnd = function() {
			var preloadWrapper = $('#preload-wrapper')
			preloadWrapper.removeClass('loading').addClass('loaded')
		}

		preloadInit()
	})()
</script><!-- Preload Screen --><!-- /GLOBAL TEMPLATES --><div class="supertop"></div><!-- Header --><div style="display:none"><script>

                                        $('body').on('click', '#login', function () {
                                            vtexid.start(
                                                    {
                                                        returnUrl: '/',
                                                        userEmail: '',
                                                        locale: 'es-PE',
                                                        forceReload: false
                                                    });
                                        });
                                    });
                                   </script><div class="ajax-content-loader" rel="/no-cache/user/welcome">
        <p class="welcome">
        Seja Bem Vindo #PreposicaoNomeLoja2# #NomeLoja#
        <em><a id="login">¿Ya eres usuario?
        </a></em>

function BdwLimitAddProducts(){
    if (vtexjs != undefined &amp;&amp; vtexjs != null &amp;&amp; vtexjs.checkout.orderForm.items.length &gt; 0) {
        var data = vtexjs.checkout.orderForm.items;
        $.each(data,function (i,item) {
            var bdwbutton = $('button[data-productid="'+item.productId+'"]');
            if(bdwbutton.length === 0){
                return true;
            }
            var bdwlimit = bdwbutton.closest('.product-item__controls').find('.product-quantity__input').attr('onchange').match(/\d/g);

            if (bdwlimit != null &amp;&amp; item.quantity &gt;= parseInt(bdwlimit[0])) {
                bdwbutton.removeClass('product-item__add-to-cart');
            }
        })
    }
}
function BwdInputLimitCart(element, limit){
    try{
        if (limit == 0 || limit ==null) {
            limit=50;
        }
        limit = (limit == null) ? 0 : limit;
        var newvalue = $(element).val();
        if(limit != 0 &amp;&amp; newvalue &gt; limit){
            $(element).val(limit);
            $(element).blur();
        }
    }
    catch(e){
        console.log(e);
    }
}

function braindwlGetCategoryCyber()
{
    var bdwCy ='';

    if (document.URL.toLowerCase().indexOf('televisores') &gt; -1)
        bdwCy = 'cymom_3290';
    else if (document.URL.toLowerCase().indexOf('audio-y-tecnologia') &gt; -1)
        bdwCy = 'cymom_3723';
    else if (document.URL.toLowerCase().indexOf('electrodomesticos') &gt; -1)
        bdwCy = 'cymom_2049';
    else if (document.URL.toLowerCase().indexOf('deporte-y-outdoor') &gt; -1)
        bdwCy = 'cymom_3335';
    else if (document.URL.toLowerCase().indexOf('dormitorio') &gt; -1)
        bdwCy = 'cymom_3332';
    else if (document.URL.toLowerCase().indexOf('muebles-y-hogar') &gt; -1)
        bdwCy = 'cymom_3334';
    else if (document.URL.toLowerCase().indexOf('vinos-y-licores') &gt; -1)
        bdwCy = 'cymom_3342';
    else if (document.URL.toLowerCase().indexOf('carnes-aves-y-pescados') &gt; -1)
        bdwCy = 'cymom_3356';
    else if (document.URL.toLowerCase().indexOf('supermercado') &gt; -1)
        bdwCy = 'cymom_3711';
    else if (document.URL.toLowerCase().indexOf('infantil') &gt; -1)
        bdwCy = 'cymom_3337';
    else if (document.URL.toLowerCase().indexOf('pasteleria') &gt; -1)
        bdwCy = 'cymom_3646';
    else if (document.URL.toLowerCase().indexOf('regalos') &gt; -1)
        bdwCy = 'cymom_3699';
    return bdwCy;
}

function bdwSetLinksCollection(urlcheck)
{
            var bdwCollectionCategory = braindwlGetCategoryCyber();


                if (urlcheck.indexOf('/buscapagina?sl') != -1 &amp;&amp; bdwCollectionCategory!='' )
                {
                    console.log('enter');

                    var bdwObGrid = $('.product-item a.product-item__image-link[href$="/p"]').not("[href*='/p?CatCyber=']");
                    $.each( bdwObGrid, function( i, val ) {
                        bdwObGrid[i].href = bdwObGrid[i].href +'?CatCyber='+bdwCollectionCategory; 
                    });

                    bdwObGrid = $('.product-item a.product-item__name[href$="/p"]').not("[href*='/p?CatCyber=']");
                    $.each( bdwObGrid, function( i, val ) {
                        bdwObGrid[i].href =bdwObGrid[i].href +'?CatCyber='+bdwCollectionCategory; 
                    });

                    bdwObGrid = $('div.product-item.gotten-product-item-data[data-uri$="/p"]').not("[data-uri*='/p?CatCyber=']");
                    $.each( bdwObGrid, function( i, val ) {console.log($(bdwObGrid[i]).attr('data-uri'));
                        $(bdwObGrid[i]).attr('data-uri', $(bdwObGrid[i]).attr('data-uri') +'?CatCyber='+bdwCollectionCategory); 
                    });
                    


                }
}

function BraindwLoadEvent(){
$(document).on("click", "._braindwTriggerClick", function(event){
    var bdwAttrCat = 'banner';
    var bdwAttrEti = 'default';
    var bdwAttrSku= '';   
    try{bdwAttrCat=$(this).attr('bw-section');}
    catch(err){}
    try{bdwAttrEti=$(this).attr('bw-title');}
    catch(err){}
    try{bdwAttrSku=$(this).attr('bw-sku');}
    catch(err){}
    BraindwPushEvent(bdwAttrCat,bdwAttrEti,bdwAttrSku);
});
    BdwLimitAddProducts();
}
function BraindwPushEvent(cat,eti,sku)
{
    try {
        if(sku!='') eti = eti+'['+sku+']';
        ga('send','event','ga-braindw',cat,eti);
    }
    catch(err) {}
}

}
function bdwGetSucCookie()
{
try{
var bdwCa = decodeURIComponent(document.cookie).split(';');
for (var bnwi = 0; bnwi &lt;  bdwCa.length; bnwi++) {
    if ( bdwCa[bnwi].indexOf("VTEXSC") &gt; -1) {
     
return bdwCa[bnwi].split('=')[2];
    }
}
}catch(e){console.log(e);}
return '';
}
function GetFoundWords() {
    var t = "",
        e = /(&lt;([^&gt;]+)&gt;)/gi,
        n = document.body.innerText;
    n = n.replace(e, " ").toLowerCase();
    var r = "{wordstofind}".split(",");
    for (i = 0; i &lt; r.length; i++) -1 != n.indexOf(r[i]) &amp;&amp; (t += r[i] + ",");
    return t
}

function formatstringBnw(s) {
var r=s.toLowerCase();
            r = r.replace(new RegExp(/\s/g),"");
            r = r.replace(new RegExp(/[àáâãäå]/g),"a");
            r = r.replace(new RegExp(/[èéêë]/g),"e");
            r = r.replace(new RegExp(/[ìíîï]/g),"i");
            r = r.replace(new RegExp(/ñ/g),"n");                
            r = r.replace(new RegExp(/[òóôõö]/g),"o");
            r = r.replace(new RegExp(/[ùúûü]/g),"u");
            
 return r;
}
function braindNdwGetProperty(t) {
    // VTEX
    try {
        if (typeof skuJson_0 != "undefined") {
            if (typeof skuJson_0.skus != "undefined") {
                if (skuJson_0.skus.length &gt; 0) {
                    var braindwVtx_script = $('script:contains("vtex.events.addData")').html();
                    var braindwVtx_json_ld = braindwVtx_script.substring(braindwVtx_script.indexOf('{'), braindwVtx_script.lastIndexOf('}') + 1);
                    if (braindwVtx_json_ld.length) {
                        var braindwVtx_json_pars = JSON.parse(braindwVtx_json_ld);
                        if (t.toLowerCase() == 'og:title') {
                            return skuJson_0.skus[0].skuname;
                        }
                        else if (t.toLowerCase() == 'og:image') {
                            return skuJson_0.skus[0].image;
                        }
                        else if (t.toLowerCase() == 'og:url') {
                            return $('link[rel=canonical]').attr('href');
                        }
                        else if (t.toLowerCase() == 'og:category') {
                            return braindwVtx_json_pars.productCategoryName;
                        }
                        else if (t.toLowerCase() == 'og:categorycode') {
                            return braindwVtx_json_pars.productCategoryId;
                        }
                        else if (t.toLowerCase() == 'og:categorypname') {
                            return braindwVtx_json_pars.productDepartmentName;
                        }
                        else if (t.toLowerCase() == 'og:categorypcode') {                           
                            try{
                                return braindwVtx_json_pars.productDepartmentId;
                            }catch(e){}
                            return braindwVtx_json_pars.productDepartmentId;
                        }
                        else if (t.toLowerCase() == 'og:brand') {
                            return braindwVtx_json_pars.productBrandName;
                        }
                        else if (t.toLowerCase() == 'og:codeproduct') {
                            return braindwVtx_json_pars.productId;
                        }   
                        else if (t.toLowerCase() == 'og:price') {
                            return skuJson_0.skus[0].bestPriceFormated.replace('S/. ','');
                        }                                   
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    } catch (ex) { }
    return "";
}

}

function GetBraindSearchMade(){
try {
    var bnwsc = '';
    ca = decodeURIComponent(document.cookie).split(';');
    for (var bnwi = 0; bnwi &lt; ca.length; bnwi++) {
        if (ca[bnwi].indexOf("VTEXSC") &gt; -1) {
            bnwsc = ca[bnwi].split('=')[2];
            if (bnwsc.indexOf('&amp;')&gt;-1)
                bnwsc = bnwsc.split('&amp;')[0];
        }
    }
    if (bnwsc=='') bnwsc=14;
    var braindwDataJSON = {
        dataset: JSON.stringify(dataLayer),
        page: '', 
        url: window.location.toString(),
        urlb: "https://s.braindw.com/Script/braindw/metro_peru_produccion_3pcw9?hs=Sat Apr 21 2018 10:00:38 GMT-0300 (Hora estándar de Argentina)",
        HashIdSession: '',
        branchOffice: bnwsc
    };
    $.ajax({
        url: "https://p.braindw.com/Api/Data/Capture",
        type: "post",
        timeout: 25000,
        data: JSON.stringify(braindwDataJSON),
        contentType: 'application/json; charset=utf-8',
        success: function (data) { },
        error: function () { },
        xhrFields: {
            withCredentials: true
        },
        crossDomain: true
    });
} catch (err) {restaurarBotones();}
}
function IsSearchMadeUser() {
    $.ajax({
        url: 'https://u.braindw.com/api/VtexApi/IsSearchMade/',
        dataType: 'json',
        cache: false,
        async: true,
        xhrFields: {
            withCredentials: true
        },
        crossDomain: true,
        timeout: 12000,
        data: 'token=&lt;%TOKEN%&gt;&amp;company=metrofood&amp;url=' + window.location.host + '&amp;BWGuid=',
        success: function (data) {
            if (data ==true)
                ShowSearch();
        },
        error: function (xhr, ajaxOptions, thrownError) { }
    });
}
function CargarBusquedas()
{
    $("#bwnSearch").html("&lt;span class='braindw_search_list' style='font-size:11px'&gt;&lt;img src='https://i.braindw.com/metro_peru/metro_peru_produccion/static_content/images/loading.gif' style='float: left;padding-right: 9px;' /&gt; Cargando búsqueda&lt;/span&gt;");
    $("#BrwSearchMovil").html("&lt;span class='braindw_search_list' style='font-size:11px'&gt;&lt;img src='https://i.braindw.com/metro_peru/metro_peru_produccion/static_content/images/loading.gif' /&gt; Cargando búsqueda&lt;/span&gt;");    
    GetSearchMadeUser();
}
function ShowProduct(position, totalProduct) {
    $(".tab-pane.ndwdropditems").css('display', 'none');
    $(".bdwsearchitem" + position).css('display', 'block'); 
    for (var bwdi=0; bwdi&lt;totalProduct;bwdi++)
    {
        $(".bwduser"+ bwdi).css('background-color',''); 
    }
    $(".bwduser"+ position).css('background-color','antiquewhite'); 
}
function GetSearchMadeUser()
{
    var bnwsc = '';
    ca = decodeURIComponent(document.cookie).split(';');
    for (var bnwi = 0; bnwi &lt; ca.length; bnwi++) {
        if (ca[bnwi].indexOf("VTEXSC") &gt; -1) {
            bnwsc = ca[bnwi].split('=')[2];
        }
    }
    if (bnwsc=='') bnwsc=15;
    $.ajax({
        url: 'https://u.braindw.com/api/VtexApi/GetSearchMade/',
        dataType: 'json',
        cache: false,
        async: true,
        xhrFields: {
            withCredentials: true
        },
        crossDomain: true,
        timeout: 20000,
        data: 'token=&lt;%TOKEN%&gt;&amp;company=metrofood&amp;url=' + window.location.host + '&amp;BWGuid=&amp;branchOffice=' + bnwsc,
        success: function (data) {
            BraindwRendeSearch(data);
        },
        error: function (xhr, ajaxOptions, thrownError) { restaurarBotones(); }
    });     
}
function ShowSearch(){
    var templateGondola =
    '&lt;style&gt;.braindw_loadtxt {font-size: 12px;} .braindw_ultbwm2 {width: 100%;} .braindw_ultbwm {font-size: .875rem;background:#ffda00!important;margin: 10px 10px 10px 0;width: 97% !important;height: 71% !important; font-weight: bold;} .braindw_search {width: 8% !important;font-weight: normal;} .braindw_search_list {font-size: 1.4rem;margin-right: 10px;} .font-icn.braindw_search_list:before {content: "\\e923";}.braindw_ultbwm:hover{background: #ffde1a;color: #f01612;}&lt;/style&gt;'+
    '&lt;div class="search-by-list-wrapper braindw_search" style="border-left: 1px solid #e6c400;"&gt;&lt;button class="braindw_ultbwm" id="bwnSearch" onclick="CargarBusquedas();"&gt;&lt;span class="font-icn braindw_search_list"&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;span class="text" id="bwnSearch" style="letter-spacing:.35px;font-size:.78rem"&gt;MIS ÚLTIMAS &lt;br&gt;BÚSQUEDAS&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;/div&gt;';
    $(".search-by-list-wrapper").after(templateGondola);    
    var templateGondolaMobil = '&lt;div id="BrwSearchMovil" class="search-mobile__tab active" data-content="multiple-search" onclick="CargarBusquedas();"&gt;&lt;span class="font-icn search"&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;span class="text" style="color: #000"&gt;MIS ÚLTIMAS &lt;br&gt;BÚSQUEDAS&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/div&gt;';
    $(".search-mobile__tabs").append(templateGondolaMobil);
}
function BraindwRendeSearch(data) {
    var totalProduct = 0;
    if (data.length &gt; 0) {
        var _braindwUtmSource = 'braindw';
        var _braindwUtmCampaign = '2018-smart-search';
        var _braindwUtmMedium = 'banner-header-generic';
        
        var _braindwUtmMediumTerm = 'banner-header-term';
        var templateGondola =
            '&lt;style&gt;' +
            '.braindw_ultbwm:hover{background: #ffde1a;color: #f01612;}'+
            '.braindw_ultbwm{font-weight: bold;}'+
            '@media only screen and (min-width : 600px) { .braindw-ultmob {display:none} }' +
            '@media only screen and (max-width : 600px){.ndwdropd {display: none !important};}' +

            '@media only screen and (max-width : 375px) { .ndwitemtitle2 {width: 52%;} }' +
            '@media only screen and (max-width : 360px) { .ndwitemtitle2 {width: 49%;} }' +
            '@media only screen and (max-width : 320px) { .ndwitemtitle2 {width: 39%;} }' +
            '.dropdown-menu {border:none;font-size:11px} ' +
            '.ndwdropdmenu {width:200px;background: #fff;float: left;} ' +
            '.ndwdropdmenu li {margin-bottom: 8px;} ' +
            '.ndwdropdmenu a:hover {text-decoration:underline} ' +
            '.ndwdropd {width: 234px;position: absolute;height: 50px;display: block;right: 265px;top: 34px;}' +
            '.ndwdpbtnbusq,.ndwdpbtndel {cursor:pointer;width: 117px;height: 50px;display: block;float: left;}' +
            '.ndwdropditems {width:290px;height:245px; float: left;background-color: white;z-index: 9999;padding: 0 5px 5px 5px;float: left;}' +

            '.ndwdropditem li,.ndwdropditem2 li {float:left} ' +

            '.ndwdropdurlimg {height:45px;width:45px;} ' +
            '.ndwmainimg {margin-right: 10px;float: left;margin-left: 5px;} ' +
            '.ndwmainimg2 {width: 13%;margin-right: 5px;float: left;margin-left: 5px;} ' +
            '.ndwitemprice {margin-top:2px;color:#e6c400;font-size: 12px; padding-top:12px} ' +
            '.ndwitemprice2 {color:red;font-size: 12px;padding-top:4px} ' +
            '.ndwdproduct {padding:5px 10px 0px 10px;} ' +
            '.scrollbar {overflow-y:auto;overflow-x:hidden;height: 240px;}' +
            '.scrollbar2 {overflow-y:auto;overflow-x:hidden;height: 105px;}' +
            '#ex3::-webkit-scrollbar{width:8px;background-color:#e7e7e7c2;} ' +

            '#ex3::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb:hover{background-color:#e7e7e7c2;border:1px solid #333333;}' +

            '.braindw-ultmob select:focus {outline:none;  box-shadow: 0 0 1px 3px rgba(180,222,250, 1);background-color:transparent;color: #222;border:1px solid #aaa;}' +
            '.braindw-ultmob select:-moz-focusring {color: transparent;text-shadow: 0 0 0 #000;}' +
            '.braindw-ultmob option {font-size: 11px;} ' +
            '.braindw-ultmob .selecult {width: 54%;margin-right: 1.5%;float: left;padding-left: 7px; color:#4E4E4E;height:28px;}' +

            '.braindw-ultmob .delult:hover {background: #a4a5a6;text-decoration: none;}' +
            '.braindw-ultmob .btndelbox {padding: 7px 7px 0 0;font-size: 0.75em;color: #e6c400;text-decoration: underline; height:20px; position: absolute;z-index:9999; right:-6px;top: -20px;} ' +
            '.braindw-ultmoberr {color:#e6c400;font-size: 0.8em;width: 100%;overflow: hidden;padding-top: 7px;} ' +
            '.braindw-ultmoberr2 {top: 88px;left: 272px;color: #017CC7;font-weight: 400;font-size: 1.3em;width: 100%;padding-top: 7px;position: absolute;z-index: 99999;} ' +
            '.braindw-contbtndel {height: 32px;color: #e6c400;font-size: 15px;font-weight: 400;padding-left: 10px;position:relative}' +
            '.braindw-btndel {cursor: pointer;font-size: 10px;position: absolute;z-index: 2;top: 0;bottom: 0;right: 12px;width: 18px;height: 18px;margin: auto;border: 0;border-radius: 50%;background-color: #C2CFD6;color: #FFF !important;line-height: 0;outline: 0;}' +
            '.ndwmaindrop {border: 1px solid #cecac7;border-radius: 5px;width: 462px;height: 329px;background: #fff;position: absolute;right: -259px;top: 62px;}' +
            '.braindw-delbusq {background: url(https://i.braindw.com/metro_peru/metro_peru_produccion/static_content/images/braindw_wm_logo_del.jpg) no-repeat 260px 0px;color:#afafaf;height:100%;cursor: pointer;text-align: right;padding-right: 35px;}' +
            '.braindw_ultbusqgo {margin-top: 5px;position: absolute;color: #e6c400 !important;padding:12px 0;diplay:block;background-color:white;font-size:16px;font-weight:400}'+
            '&lt;/style&gt;' +
            '&lt;div class="ndwdropd open"&gt;' +
            '&lt;div class="braindw-ultmoberr2" style="display:none;color:#a9a6a4ed"&gt;' +       
            '¡Se han borrado las búsquedas!&lt;/div&gt;' +
            '&lt;a class="dropdown-toggle ndwdpbtnbusq" id="dropdownMenu2" data-toggle="dropdown" aria-haspopup="true" aria-expanded="true" onclick="Mostrar()"&gt;&lt;/a&gt;' +
            '&lt;a class="ndwdpbtndel" onclick="DeleteSearch();"&gt;&lt;/a&gt;' +
            '&lt;div style="display: none;z-index: 999;" class="ndwmaindrop"&gt;&lt;ul class="dropdown-menu ndwdropdmenu" aria-labelledby="dropdownMenu2" style="display:none;padding-bottom:20px;padding-left:20px;padding-top:20px;width:170px;"&gt;&lt;div style="height: 32px;color: red;font-size: 15px;font-weight:400;padding-left:10px;"&gt;Últimas búsquedas&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div style="border-right: 1px solid red;padding-right: 9px;" class="msgdelbusq"&gt;&lt;div class="scrollbar" id="ex3"&gt;&lt;div class="ndwcontent"&gt;';

        var itemtemplateGondola = '&lt;li style="max-height: 28px;" class="bwduser%pos%" bw-section="ultimas-busquedas"&gt;&lt;span id="user-name%pos%" onmouseover="ShowProduct(%pos%,%totalProductCount%);" style="color:black;" class="visible-lg visible-md ndwdproduct"&gt;&lt;a href="%ref%" style="font-weight:600;color:red;padding:2px;font-size:14px;" &gt;%searchterm%&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;span style="font-size: 9px;padding-left:19px;color:black;"&gt;%dateadded%&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/li&gt;';
        var itemsProducts = '&lt;div class="dropdown-menu tab-content" style="padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px;display: none;"&gt;&lt;div class="braindw-contbtndel" onclick="Borrarcaja();" &gt;&lt;button class="braindw-btndel" style="background-color: #000 !important;"&gt;&lt;span style="color:#fff!important;font-weight:bold"&gt;X&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;/div&gt;';
        var searchMovil = '&lt;div id="braindwMySearch2" class="braindw-ultmob visible-xs visible-sm" style="margin-left:2%;width: 96%;-webkit-box-shadow: 7px 10px 5px -1px rgba(0,0,0,0.51);  -moz-box-shadow: 7px 10px 5px -1px rgba(0,0,0,0.51);z-index:999;display:none;background-color:white;position:absolute;height: 316px;box-shadow: 0px 0px 10px 1px black;"&gt;&lt;div style="width:100%;margin-left: 14px;margin-top:8px;"&gt;&lt;button class="braindw-btndel" onclick="Borrarcaja();" style="background-color: #000 !important;top:-260px;right:15px;"&gt;&lt;span style="font-size:16px;margin-top:-4px;color:#FFF !important;background-color:#fff !important"&gt;X&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;div style="height: 32px;color: red;font-size: 15px;font-weight:400;padding-left:10px;margin-top:12px;"&gt;Últimas búsquedas&lt;/div&gt;&lt;select id="braindw-ultmob2" onchange="BraindwViewProducts();" style="margin-top: 5px;" class="selecult"&gt;&lt;option value="" selected="selected"&gt;Elija su búsqueda&lt;/option&gt;'
        var ItemMovil = ''
        var ProdMovil = '';
        var bdwLastSearch = '';
        $.each(data, function (i, item) {
            if (item.SearchTerm != null) {              
                if (bdwLastSearch.indexOf(item.SearchTerm)==-1)
                {     
                    bdwLastSearch+="|" + item.SearchTerm;
                    var customSearchLink =item.UrlSearch;       
                    var current = itemtemplateGondola.replace('%searchterm%', decodeURI(item.SearchTerm)).replace("%ref%", customSearchLink).replace(/%pos%/g, totalProduct).replace('%dateadded%', '');                
                    var prodItem = '';                  
                    ItemMovil += '&lt;option value="prodmovil' + totalProduct + '"&gt;' + decodeURI(item.SearchTerm) + '&lt;/option&gt;';
                    ProdMovil += '&lt;div id="prodmovil' + totalProduct + '" class="box" style="position: relative;width: 90.5%;"&gt;&lt;div class="scrollbar2" id="ex3" style="height:212px"&gt;&lt;div class="ndwcontent"&gt;';
                    $.each(item.ProductsDefaults, function (j, prod) {
                        var bwdpriceOnLine = prod.Precio;
                        if (prod.PrecioKgLtr!=null &amp;&amp; prod.PrecioKgLtr!='')
                        {
                            var bwdpriceOnLine = prod.PrecioKgLtr;
                        }
                        if (bwdpriceOnLine.indexOf('.')&gt;-1)
                        {
                            if (bwdpriceOnLine.indexOf(',')&gt;-1)
                            {
                                var bwdDecimal = '';
                                var bwdEntero=bwdpriceOnLine.split('.')[0];                         
                                if (bwdEntero.indexOf(',')&gt;-1)
                                {
                                    bwdEntero = bwdEntero.replace(',','.');
                                    bwdDecimal = bwdpriceOnLine.split('.')[1];
                                    bwdpriceOnLine = bwdEntero + ',' + bwdDecimal;      
                                }
                                else
                                {
                                    bwdpriceOnLine = bwdpriceOnLine.replace('.',',');                               
                                }                                                       
                            }
                            else
                                bwdpriceOnLine = bwdpriceOnLine.replace(',','.');
                            
                            if (bwdpriceOnLine.split(',')[1]=="00")
                                bwdpriceOnLine =bwdpriceOnLine.split(',')[0];
                                                        
                            if (bwdpriceOnLine.indexOf("0")==0)
                                bwdpriceOnLine =bwdpriceOnLine.substring(1);                                
                        }
                        var customLink = prod.Link;         
                        prodItem += '&lt;a href="' + customLink + '" style="color:black;z-index:9" class="_braindwTriggerClick" bw-title=' + prod.Descripcion + ' bw-section="ultimas-busquedas" bw-sku=' + item.IdArticulo + '&gt;&lt;ul class="ndwdropditem2"&gt;';
                        prodItem = prodItem +
                            '&lt;li class="ndwmainimg2"&gt;&lt;img src="' + prod.UrlImagen + '" class="braindw2103-tabimg ndwdropdurlimg" /&gt;&lt;/li&gt;' +
                            '&lt;li class="ndwitemtitle2"&gt;' +
                            '&lt;div style="font-family: Myriad Pro;font-weight: normal;font-size:12px;color:#000;"&gt;' + prod.Descripcion + '&lt;/div&gt;' +
                            '&lt;div style="font-size: 9px;color:#8f8f8f;"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;' +
                            '&lt;div class="ndwitemprice2" style="float:left;margin-right: 2%;"&gt;S/' + bwdpriceOnLine + '&lt;/div&gt;';
                        if(prod.PrecioAnterior!=''){
                             prodItem = prodItem +
                                '&lt;div class="" style="text-decoration: line-through;color: #666;text-decoration: line-through;color: #666;font-size: 10px;   padding-top: 4px;"&gt;S/' + prod.PrecioAnterior + '&lt;/div&gt; ' ;                 
                        }       
                        if (prod.CucardaOferta!=null){
                             prodItem = prodItem + '&lt;div class="" style="color: #E81C25;font-weight: 700;"&gt;' + prod.CucardaOferta + '&lt;/div&gt; ' 
                        }                           
                        prodItem = prodItem +'&lt;/li&gt;&lt;/ul&gt;&lt;/a&gt;';                          
                    });
                    if (prodItem == '') { prodItem = "&lt;span style='font-size: 13px;padding:8px'&gt;No encontramos resultados para tu búsqueda.&lt;/span&gt;"; }
                    if (totalProduct == 0)
                        displayinicial = 'block';
                    else
                        displayinicial = 'none';

                    itemsProducts +=
                        '&lt;div class="tab-pane ndwdropditems bdwsearchitem' + totalProduct + '" id="ProdItem' + totalProduct + '" style="display:' + displayinicial + '"&gt;' +
                        '&lt;div class="scrollbar" id="ex3"&gt;&lt;div class="ndwcontent"&gt;' + prodItem + '&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt; ' +
                        '&lt;div class="braindw-delbusq" onclick="Delbusq();"&gt;Borrar búsquedas&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;';
                    ProdMovil += prodItem + '&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;';
                    templateGondola += current;
                    totalProduct++;
                }                
            }
        });
        if (totalProduct == 0) return;
        searchMovil += ItemMovil + '&lt;/select&gt;&lt;a href="#" class="delult" onclick="DeleteSearch();" style="font-size:12px;margin-top:4px;padding-top:0px;line-height: 28px;"&gt;Borrar búsquedas&lt;/a&gt;&lt;div class="braindw-ultmoberr" style="display:none;color:#a9a6a4ed"&gt;' +      
        '¡Se han borrado las búsquedas!&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="output" style="position: relative;margin-top: -13px;"&gt;' + ProdMovil + '&lt;/div&gt;';
        itemsProducts += '&lt;/div&gt;';
        templateGondola += '&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/ul&gt;' + itemsProducts + '&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;';
        templateGondola = templateGondola.replace(/%totalProductCount%/g, totalProduct);
        $('#braindwMySearch2').remove();
        $(".search-by-list-wrapper").after(templateGondola);
        $(".search-mobile__tabs").after(searchMovil);
        
        if (screen.width&lt;700)
            MostrarMovil();
        else
            Mostrar();      
    }
    restaurarBotones();
}

function restaurarBotones()
{
    $("#bwnSearch").html('&lt;button class="braindw_ultbwm2" id="bwnSearch" onclick="CargarBusquedas();"&gt;&lt;span class="font-icn braindw_search_list"&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;span class="text" id="bwnSearch" style="letter-spacing:.35px;font-size:.78rem""&gt;MIS ÚLTIMAS &lt;br&gt;BUSQUEDAS&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/button&gt;');   
    $("#BrwSearchMovil").html('&lt;div class="search-mobile__tab active" data-content="multiple-search" onclick="GetSearchMadeUser();" style="width: 100%;border-bottom: none;"&gt;&lt;span class="font-icn search"&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;span class="text" style="color: #000"&gt;MIS ÚLTIMAS &lt;br&gt;BÚSQUEDAS&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/div&gt;');
}

function BraindwViewProducts() {
    $('.box').hide();
    $('#' + $('#braindw-ultmob2').val()).show();
    $(".btndelbox").click(function () {
        $(".box").hide();
        $("#braindw-ultmob2").val('0')
        $("#braindwMySearch2").hide();
    }); 
    $('.braindw-btndel').click(function () {
        $(".box").hide();
        $("#braindw-ultmob2").val('0')
        $("#braindwMySearch2").hide();
    });
}
function DeleteSearch() {
    $.ajax({
        url: 'https://p.braindw.com/Api/Data/ClearMasterDataSearh/',
        dataType: 'json',
        cache: false,
        async: true,
        type: 'GET',
        xhrFields: {
            withCredentials: true
        },
        crossDomain: true,
        timeout:12000,
        data: 'company=metrofood',
        success: function (data) {
            $(".box").hide();
            $('.dropdown-menu').remove();
            $('.tab-pane,.ndwdropditems').css('display', 'none');
            $('.ndwmaindrop').css({
                "width": "234px",
                "height": "96px",
            });
            Borrarcaja();
            try {
                $(".braindw_search").css('display', 'none');
                $(".ndwmaindrop").css('display', 'none');
            } catch (e) {}
        },
        error: function (xhr, ajaxOptions, thrownError) { restaurarBotones(); }
    });
}
function Borrarcaja() {
    $('.ndwmaindrop').hide();
    $('.braindw-ultmoberr2').hide();
    $(".box").hide();
    $("#braindw-ultmob2").val('0')
    $("#braindwMySearch2").hide();
}
function Mostrar() {
    if ($(".ndwdropdmenu,.ndwmaindrop").css('display') == 'block') {
        $(".ndwdropdmenu,.ndwmaindrop").css('display', 'none');
        $(".tab-content").css('display', 'none');
    }
    else {
        $(".ndwdropdmenu,.ndwmaindrop").show();
        $(".tab-content").show();
    }
}
function MostrarMovil()
{
    // Vemos si hace falta un loding
     $('#braindwMySearch2').css('display', 'block');
}
function Delbusq() {
    $(".braindw-delbusq").click(function () {
        $('.msgdelbusq').css('display', 'none');
        $('.tab-pane,.ndwdropditems').css('display', 'none');
        $('.braindw-ultmoberr2').show();
    });
    DeleteSearch();
}
$(document).ready( function() {
    GetBraindSearchMade();
    IsSearchMadeUser();
}); 
function parseJwt (token) {
    try{
    var base64Url = token.split('.')[1];
    var base64 = base64Url.replace('-', '+').replace('_', '/');
    return JSON.parse(window.atob(base64));
    }catch(e)
    { return null;}
}

if ($('.user-menu__user-name').length&gt;0 )
{
    try{
        var cookie_user = Cookies.get('VtexIdclientAutCookie_metrofood');
        var token = parseJwt(cookie_user);
        $.ajax({
            url: "https://s.braindw.com/tracking/SetCookiesNdway",
            type: 'POST',
            xhrFields: {
                withCredentials: true
            },
            dataType: 'jsonp',
            data: 'email='+ token.sub + '&amp;company=metro_peru_testing ',
            success: function(data) {
                return false;       
            }
        });
    }catch(e)
    {}
}

try {
    $(document).ajaxSuccess(function (e, r, a) {
        try {
             if (a.url.length &gt;= 36) {
                if (a.url.toLowerCase().substring(0, 36).toLowerCase() == '/wongfood/dataentities/re/documents/') {
                  var bdwCode = a.url.split('/')[a.url.split('/').length - 1].split('?')[0];
                    var bdwView = $("[data-id='" + bdwCode + "']").first();
                    if (bdwView.length &gt; 0) {
                        var bdwViewTitle ='';
                        try{
                            bdwViewTitle = bdwView.find(".product-item__name").first().attr("title");
                        }catch(e){}

                        var bdwViewImageLink =''
                        try{
                            bdwViewImageLink = bdwView.find(".product-item__image-link").first().attr("href");
                        }catch(e){}
                        
                        var bdwViewImageSrc = '' ;
                        try{
                            bdwViewImageSrc = bdwView.find(".product-item__image-link img").first().attr('src');
                        }catch(e){}
                                                
                        if (bdwCode.length &gt; 0 &amp;&amp; bdwViewTitle.length &gt; 0 &amp;&amp; bdwViewImageLink.length &gt; 0 &amp;&amp; bdwViewImageSrc.length &gt; 0) {

                            BraindwPushView(bdwCode, encodeURIComponent(bdwViewTitle), encodeURIComponent(bdwViewImageLink), encodeURIComponent(bdwViewImageSrc),0,0)
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        } catch (c) { console.log(c); }
    })
} catch (err) { console.log(err); }

function BraindwPushView(code, title, link, image,iscart,po) {
    try {
        var _braindwTimeoutService = 5000;       
        BraindwGetCapture(code, title, link, image, iscart, po);

        var i = document.createElement("script");
        i.async = !0, i.src = 'https://s.braindw.com/tracking/track?HASH=metro_peru_produccion_3pcw9&amp;branchOffice=' + bdwGetSucCookie() + '&amp;wordsfound=&amp;buyer=&amp;name=&amp;lastname=&amp;gender=&amp;country=&amp;state=&amp;city=&amp;email=&amp;u=' + link, i.charset = "UTF-8", document.head.appendChild(i);
    } catch (c) { console.log(c); }
}

$(document).ready( function() {
    
    $('.product-add-to-cart.product-add-to-cart--product-view.btn.red.add-to-cart').click(function(){
        
        if (document.URL.lastIndexOf('/p')&gt;-1){         
            CaptureCartFicha();
        }
    });

    $('.product-item__add-to-cart.product-add-to-cart').click(function(){
        
        var productId = '';
        var productTitle = '';
        var link = '';
        var image = '';
        var price = '';

        var parent = $(this).closest('.vitrine');
        if (parent.length!=0)
        {
            //capture en gond de categoria
            productId = $(this).parents('li').find('.product-item__add-to-cart').attr('data-productId');
            productTitle = $(this).parents('li').find('.product-item__name').text();
            link = $(this).parents('li').find('.product-item__info a').attr('href');
            image = $(this).parents('li').find('.product-item__image-link img').attr('src');
            price = $(this).parents('li').find('span.product-prices__value.product-prices__value--best-price').text();
            price = parseFloat(price.replace('S/','').replace(',','').replace('.00','').split('.')[0]);
        }else{
            //capture gondolas braindw         
            productId = $(this).parents('li').find('.product-item__add-to-cart').attr('data-productId');
            productTitle = $(this).parents('li').find('a.prateleira__name._braindwTriggerClick').text();
            link = $(this).parents('li').find('a.prateleira__name._braindwTriggerClick ').attr('href');
            image = $(this).parents('li').find('.prateleira__image img').attr('src');
            price = $(this).parents('li').find('div.prateleira__best-price').text();
            price = price.replace('Online S/','');
        }
        BraindwGetCapture(productId, productTitle, link, image, 1, price);
    });


    $('.product-add-to-cart.btn.red.add-to-cart._braindwTriggerClick').click(function(){
        //banner
        
        var productId = $(this).parents('ul').find('.product-add-to-cart.btn.red.add-to-cart._braindwTriggerClick').attr('data-productId');
        var productTitle = $(this).parents('ul').find('.braindw_bigbannercategoria_title a._braindwTriggerClick').text();
        var link = $(this).parents('ul').find('.braindw_hadj a._braindwTriggerClick').attr('href');
        var image = $(this).parents('ul').find('.braindw_hadj a._braindwTriggerClick img').attr('src');
        var price = $(this).parents('ul').find('div.braindw_bigbannercategoria_price').text();
        price = price.replace('Online S/','');
        BraindwGetCapture(productId, productTitle, link, image, 1, price);
    });
});

function CaptureCartFicha(){
     try {
      var tt = encodeURIComponent(braindNdwGetProperty("og:title")),
            i = escape(braindNdwGetProperty("og:image")),
            s = escape(braindNdwGetProperty("og:url")),
            c = escape(formatstringBnw(braindNdwGetProperty("og:category")));
            cc = escape(braindNdwGetProperty("og:categorycode"));
            bd = escape(braindNdwGetProperty("og:brand"));

        po = parseFloat(escape(braindNdwGetProperty("og:price").replace(',','')).split('.')[0])
        ps = escape(braindNdwGetProperty("og:pricesale"));
        pm = escape(braindNdwGetProperty("og:promotion"));
        pol = '';
        if (ps != '' &amp;&amp; ps.length &gt; 1 &amp;&amp; po != '') {
            pol = po;
            po = ps;
        }
        else
        {
            pol = '';
            ps = '';
        }           
        listcategories='';
        if (document.URL.indexOf('CatCyber')&gt;-1){
            listcategories =  document.URL.substring(document.URL.indexOf('CatCyber')).split('=')[1]; 
        }


        braindw_cpcode = escape(braindNdwGetProperty("og:categorypcode"));
        braindw_cpname =  escape(formatstringBnw(braindNdwGetProperty("og:categorypname")));            
        codprod = escape(braindNdwGetProperty("og:codeproduct"));
      
        //var o = document.createElement("script");
        BraindwGetCapture(codprod, tt, s, i, 1, po);
         } catch (c) { console.log(c); }
}

function clearProductsBwnGond(IdCode,sufix) {
    try {
        var dataAdic = " kg";
        if ($('#brandwProductGond-' + sufix + '-' + IdCode).val().indexOf(',') &gt; -1 || $('#brandwProductGond-' + sufix + '-' + IdCode).val().indexOf('.') &gt; -1) {
            dataAdic = " kg";
        } else {
            dataAdic = "";
        }
        var actual = parseFloat($('input[id=cantProdBwnGond-' + sufix + '-' + IdCode +']').val().replace(' kg', ''));
        var peso = parseFloat($('#brandwProductGond-' + sufix + '-' + IdCode).val().replace(' kg', ''));
        if ((actual - peso) &lt;= 0) {
            $('input[id=cantProdBwnGond-' + sufix + '-' + IdCode +']').val(peso + dataAdic); 
            $('#clearProductsBwnGond-' + sufix + '-' + IdCode).removeClass('brandwdecrease');
            $('#clearProductsBwnGond-' + sufix + '-' + IdCode).addClass('brandwdecreasedisable');
        } else {
            $('#clearProductsBwnGond-' + sufix + '-' + IdCode).removeClass('brandwdecreasedisable');
            $('#clearProductsBwnGond-' + sufix + '-' + IdCode).addClass('brandwdecrease');
            if (dataAdic == "") {
                $('input[id=cantProdBwnGond-' + sufix + '-' + IdCode +']').val((actual - peso));
            } else {
                var pesoFinal = (actual - peso).toFixed(2);
                if (pesoFinal[pesoFinal.length - 1] == '0')
                    pesoFinal = pesoFinal.substr(0, pesoFinal.length - 1);

                $('input[id=cantProdBwnGond-' + sufix + '-' + IdCode +']').val(pesoFinal + dataAdic);
            }
        }
    } catch (e) {}
}

function addProductsBwnGond(IdCode, sufix, limit) {
    
    try {
        if(limit == null) limit = 0;
        var dataAdic = " kg";
        if ($('#brandwProductGond-' + sufix + '-' + IdCode).val().indexOf(',') &gt; -1 || $('#brandwProductGond-' + sufix + '-' + IdCode).val().indexOf('.') &gt; -1)
            dataAdic = " kg";  else dataAdic = "";      
        var actual = parseFloat($('input[id=cantProdBwnGond-' + sufix + '-' + IdCode +']').val().replace(' kg', ''));
        if (limit === 0) {
           limit = 50;
        }

        if (limit != 0 &amp;&amp; actual &gt;= limit) {
           return;
        }
        var peso = parseFloat($('#brandwProductGond-' + sufix + '-' + IdCode ).val().replace(' kg', ''));
        $('button#clearProductsBwnGond-' + sufix + '-' + IdCode).removeClass('brandwdecreasedisable');
        $('button#clearProductsBwnGond-' + sufix + '-' + IdCode).addClass('brandwdecrease');
        if (dataAdic == "") 
            $('input[id=cantProdBwnGond-' + sufix + '-' + IdCode +']').val((actual + peso));
        else {
            var pesoFinal = (actual + peso).toFixed(2);
            if (pesoFinal[pesoFinal.length - 1] == '0')
                pesoFinal = pesoFinal.substr(0, pesoFinal.length - 1);

            $('input[id=cantProdBwnGond-' + sufix + '-' + IdCode +']').val(pesoFinal + dataAdic);
        }
    } catch (e) {}
}

function AddToMiniCartBraindGond(url, IdCode, sufix, limit) {    
    
    try {
        var quantity = Math.round(parseFloat($('input[id=cantProdBwnGond-' + sufix + '-' + IdCode +']').val()) / parseFloat($('#brandwProductGond-' + sufix + '-' + IdCode).val()));
        var product = vtexjs.checkout.orderForm.items.find(x =&gt; x.productId === IdCode.toString());
        var cantItems = product !== undefined ? product.quantity : 0;

        var totalitems = quantity + cantItems;

        if (limit === undefined || limit === 0 || limit === null) { limit = 50; }

        if (totalitems &gt; limit) {            
            quantity = limit - cantItems;
            if (quantity === 0) { return; }
        }else{
            quantity = totalitems;
        }

        url = url + "&amp;redirect=false";
        url = url.replace('qty=1', 'qty=' + quantity);
        $.ajax({
            url: url,
            dataType: 'json',
            cache: false,
            async: true,
            timeout: 9000,
            data: '',
            success: function(data) {
                vtexjs.checkout.getOrderForm();
                BdwLimitAddProducts();
                $("#minicart-navigation").css('display', 'block');
                if(location.href.match(/.*?:\/\/(.*)metro.pe\/cart(.*)/g) != null){
                    $("#shipping-preference.overlay").hide();
                }
            },
            error: function(xhr, ajaxOptions, thrownError) {}
        });
    } catch (e) {}
}

var bdw_arbol_category = '';
function Bdw_GetArbolCategoriesBySku() {
    try{
        var url = 'https://' + document.URL.split('/')[2] + '/api/catalog_system/pub/products/search';  
        var bdw_sku = '';
        var skuIds = [];
        if(location.href.match(/.*?:\/\/(.*)metro.pe\/cart(.*)/g) != null){
            for (var i=0;i&lt;$('.product-item').length;i++)
            {
                try{
                    var skuId = $($('.product-item')[i]).data('id');
                    bdw_sku +='fq=skuId:' + skuId + '&amp;';
                    skuIds.push(skuId);
                }catch(e){}
            }
            bdw_sku += '&amp;sc=' + bdwGetSucCookie();
        }
        else if(location.href.match(/.*?:\/\/(.*)metro.pe\/(.*)\/(p)/g) != null){
            bdw_sku = 'fq=skuId:' + skuJson_0.skus[0].sku +'&amp;sc=' + bdwGetSucCookie();
        }
        
        console.log(bdw_sku);
        $.ajax({
            url: url,
            dataType: 'json',
            cache: false,
            async: true,
            timeout: 9000,
            data: bdw_sku,
            success: function (data) {
                try {
                    bdw_arbol_category ='';
                    if(location.href.match(/.*?:\/\/(.*)metro.pe\/cart(.*)/g) != null){
                        var productsFinded = [];
                        for (var j=0; j &lt; skuIds.length; j++){
                            var filtered = data.filter(function(e) {
                              return e.items[0].itemId == skuIds[j];
                            });
                            productsFinded.push(filtered[0]);
                        }
                        
                        for (var i=0;i&lt;productsFinded.length;i++)
                        {
                            bdw_arbol_category += productsFinded[i].categoriesIds[0];
                        }
                        var catNorepeat = '';
                        var arbdwarbolcategory=bdw_arbol_category.split('/');
                        for(var i=0;i&lt;arbdwarbolcategory.length;i++)
                        {
                            if (catNorepeat.indexOf(arbdwarbolcategory[i])==-1 &amp;&amp; arbdwarbolcategory[i]!='')
                            {
                                catNorepeat+= arbdwarbolcategory[i] + ",";
                            }                   
                        }
                        bdw_arbol_category = catNorepeat.replace(/,,/g,',');
                    }
                    else if(location.href.match(/.*?:\/\/(.*)metro.pe\/(.*)\/(p)/g) != null){
                        bdw_arbol_category = data[0].categoriesIds[0];
                    }
                    
                    console.log(bdw_arbol_category);
                }
                catch (e) { console.log(e)}
            },
            error: function (xhr, ajaxOptions, thrownError) { console.log(thrownError);}
        });
    }catch(e){}
}

function BraindwRender(data, title, selector, eventName, sufix, itemCant, parentId) {
    var templateGondolaProduct = "";
    data = $.grep(data, function(n, i) {
        return decodeURI(document.URL).indexOf(n.Link) === -1
    });    
    var resto = data.length % itemCant;
    data.splice(data.length - resto, resto);

    if (data.length &gt; 0) {
        if (bdwMobile.any() != null) {
            var isGondCategory = parentId=='braindw_tv'||parentId=='braindw_elec'||parentId=='braindw_tec'||parentId=='braindw_dor'||parentId=='braindw_alb'||
                                 parentId=='braindw_lac'||parentId=='braindw_per'||parentId=='braindw_bebidas'||parentId=='braindw_cer'||parentId=='braindw_lim'; 
            if (isGondCategory) {
                templateGondolaProduct = '&lt;section class="wrapper shop-list wfd_deparment" style="margin-bottom:0px;margin-top: 50px!important;" id="' + parentId + '"&gt;' + '&lt;div class="center"&gt;' + '&lt;div class="header clear-fix"&gt;&lt;h2 class="title"&gt;&lt;span class="icn cat-tecnologia"&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;span class="text braindwtxt23"&gt;' + title + '&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/h2&gt;&lt;/div&gt;' + '&lt;div class="braindw_slider' + itemCant + '_gondolaproducts"&gt;&lt;div class="braindw_slider' + itemCant + ' ' + selector + '" &gt;';
            } else {
                templateGondolaProduct = '&lt;section class="wrapper shop-list wfd_deparment" style="margin-bottom:0px;" id="' + parentId + '"&gt;' + '&lt;div class="center"&gt;' + '&lt;div class="header clear-fix"&gt;&lt;h2 class="title"&gt;&lt;span class="icn cat-tecnologia"&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;span class="text braindwtxt23"&gt;' + title + '&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/h2&gt;&lt;/div&gt;' + '&lt;div class="braindw_slider' + itemCant + '_gondolaproducts"&gt;&lt;div class="braindw_slider' + itemCant + ' ' + selector + '" &gt;';
            }            
        }else{
            templateGondolaProduct = '&lt;section class="wrapper shop-list wfd_deparment" style="margin-bottom:0px;" id="' + parentId + '"&gt;' + '&lt;div class="center"&gt;' + '&lt;div class="header clear-fix"&gt;&lt;h2 class="title"&gt;&lt;span class="icn cat-tecnologia"&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;span class="text braindwtxt23"&gt;' + title + '&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/h2&gt;&lt;/div&gt;' + '&lt;div class="braindw_slider' + itemCant + '_gondolaproducts"&gt;&lt;div class="braindw_slider' + itemCant + ' ' + selector + '" &gt;';       
        }
        
        var itemproduct = '&lt;li style="position: relative"&gt;' + 
        '&lt;div class="braindw_cucwm" style="display:%visibility_ahorro%"&gt;%CucardaOferta%&lt;/div&gt;' + 
        '&lt;div class="bdw-cybermetro-cucarda" style="display:none;margin-top:-30px;"&gt;&lt;img src="https://wongfood.vteximg.com.br/arquivos/Tag_CW_Metro.png" alt="cyberwong" class="bdw-cyberwong-img"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;'+
        '&lt;a href="%link%"  class="_braindwTriggerClick" bw-title="%Descripcion%" bw-section="' + eventName + '" bw-sku="%idcode%"&gt;&lt;div class="braindw_hflag"&gt;&lt;div class="flag %bnwTag0%"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="flag %bnwTag1%"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="flag %bnwTag2%"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/a&gt;' + 
        '&lt;a class="prateleira__image-link _braindwTriggerClick" bw-title="%Descripcion%" bw-section="' + eventName + '" bw-sku="%idcode%" href="%link%"&gt;&lt;div class="prateleira__image"&gt;&lt;img src="%urlImage%"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/a&gt;' + 
        
        '&lt;div class="product-item__flags"&gt;' +
                '%cucas-flags-banderas%'+
        '&lt;/div&gt;'+
        '&lt;div class="product-item__flags bdw-flags" style="height: 60px;"&gt;' +
            '%cucas-flags%'+
        '&lt;/div&gt;'+

        '&lt;div class="prateleira  prateleira__content"&gt;' +
        '&lt;a class="prateleira__name _braindwTriggerClick" bw-title="%Descripcion%" bw-section="' + eventName + '" bw-sku="%idcode%" href="%link%"&gt;%title%&lt;/a&gt;' + '&lt;a class="prateleira__marca _braindwTriggerClick" bw-title="%Descripcion%" bw-section="' + eventName + '" bw-sku="%idcode%" href="%link%"&gt;%brand%&lt;/a&gt;' + '&lt;a href="%link%" class="_braindwTriggerClick" bw-title="%Descripcion%" bw-section="' + eventName + '" bw-sku="%idcode%"&gt;' + '&lt;braindwgdif class="braindwgdifct"&gt;' + '&lt;div class="prateleira__list-price" style="visibility:%visibility_descuento%"&gt;Regular &lt;span&gt;%PrecioAnterior%&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/div&gt; ' + '&lt;div class="prateleira__best-price"&gt;Online &lt;span&gt;%price%&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/div&gt;' + '&lt;/braindwgdif&gt;&lt;/a&gt;' + '&lt;div style="visibility:%visibility_preciokgltr%"&gt;(%PrecioKgLtr% x kg)&lt;/div&gt;' + '&lt;/div&gt;' + '&lt;div class="product-item__controls" style="visibility: %visibility_nostock%"&gt;' + '&lt;div class="product-quantity"&gt;' + '&lt;input id="cantProdBwnGond-%sufix%-%idcode%" type="text" class="product-quantity__input" value="%pesoproduct%" style="%styleAgregar%" onchange="BwdInputLimitCart(this, %saleNumber%)"&gt;' + '&lt;input type="text" style="display:none;"&gt;' + '&lt;input type="text" id="brandwProductGond-%sufix%-%idcode%" value="%pesoproduct%" style="display:none;"&gt;' + '&lt;div class="product-quantity__controls" style="%styleAgregar2%"&gt;' + '&lt;button id="addProductsBwnGond-IdCode" onclick="addProductsBwnGond(%idcode%, \'%sufix%\',%saleNumber%)" class="product-quantity__control--increase font-icn plus brandwMore"&gt; &lt;/button&gt;' + '&lt;button id="clearProductsBwnGond-%sufix%-%idcode%" onclick="clearProductsBwnGond(%idcode%, \'%sufix%\')"  class="product-quantity__control--decrease font-icn minus brandwdecreasedisable"&gt;&lt;/button&gt;' + '&lt;/div&gt;' + '&lt;/div&gt;' + '&lt;button onclick="AddToMiniCartBraindGond(%AddTocart%, %idcode%,\'%sufix%\')" style="margin-left:5px;" class="product-item__add-to-cart product-add-to-cart btn add-to-cart braindw_addToCart _braindwTriggerClick" bw-title="%Descripcion%" bw-section="' + eventName + '" bw-sku="%idcode%" data-productid="%idcode%"&gt;&lt;span class="font-icn check"&gt;&lt;/span&gt;'+
        '&lt;span class="product-add-to-cart__text product-add-to-cart__text--success"&gt;Agregar&lt;/span&gt;'+
        '&lt;span class="font-icn plus"&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;span class="font-icn shopping-cart"&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;span class="product-add-to-cart__text product-add-to-cart__text--default"&gt;Agregar&lt;/span&gt;' + '&lt;/button&gt;' + '&lt;div class="product-item__cart-amount"&gt;&lt;span class="font-icn check"&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;span class="value"&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/div&gt;' + '&lt;/div&gt;' + '&lt;/li&gt;';
        var indice = 0;
        var itemproductTopTen = '';
        var screencapture = screen.width;
        var cantitems = itemCant;
        if (screencapture &lt;= 800 &amp;&amp; screencapture &gt;= 500) {
            cantitems = 3
        } else if (screencapture &lt; 500) {
            cantitems = 2
        }
        var itemSinStock = '&lt;div class="warning" style="margin-top:-5px;"&gt;&lt;span class="font-icn attention" style="margin-top: 2px;"&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;span class="text" style="color:red;font-weight: bolder;margin-left: 2px;"&gt;Sin Stock&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/div&gt;'
        $.each(data, function(i, item) {
            var customLink = item.Link;
            var customItemGondolaProduct = itemproduct.replace("%brand%", item.Marca);
            customItemGondolaProduct = customItemGondolaProduct.replace("%srcImageCucardaExterna%", item.Image_CucardaUrlImageExterna);
            customItemGondolaProduct = customItemGondolaProduct.replace(/%link%/g, customLink);
            customItemGondolaProduct = customItemGondolaProduct.replace("%urlImage%", item.UrlImagen);
            customItemGondolaProduct = customItemGondolaProduct.replace("%discount_description%", item.Articulo_Oferta);
            customItemGondolaProduct = customItemGondolaProduct.replace("%marca%", +item.Marca);
            customItemGondolaProduct = customItemGondolaProduct.replace(/%linkCart%/g, item.addToCart);
            customItemGondolaProduct = customItemGondolaProduct.replace(/%idcode%/g, item.IdArticulo);
            customItemGondolaProduct = customItemGondolaProduct.replace(/%AddTocart%/g, "'" + item.addToCart + "'");
            customItemGondolaProduct = customItemGondolaProduct.replace(/%sufix%/g, sufix);
            customItemGondolaProduct = customItemGondolaProduct.replace(/%saleNumber%/g, item.SaleNumber);
            if (item.PrecioKgLtr != null &amp;&amp; item.PrecioKgLtr != '') {
                customItemGondolaProduct = customItemGondolaProduct.replace("%price%", "S/" + item.PrecioKgLtr + " x kg");
                customItemGondolaProduct = customItemGondolaProduct.replace(/%Precio%/g, item.PrecioKgLtr + " x kg")
            } else {
                if (item.Precio != '0.00' &amp;&amp; item.Precio != '0') {
                    customItemGondolaProduct = customItemGondolaProduct.replace(/%visibility_nostock%/g, 'visible');
                    customItemGondolaProduct = customItemGondolaProduct.replace("%price%", "S/" + item.Precio);
                    customItemGondolaProduct = customItemGondolaProduct.replace(/%Precio%/g, item.Precio)
                } else {
                    customItemGondolaProduct = customItemGondolaProduct.replace(/%visibility_nostock%/g, 'hidden');
                    customItemGondolaProduct = customItemGondolaProduct.replace('&lt;div class="prateleira__best-price"&gt;Online &lt;span&gt;%price%&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/div&gt;', itemSinStock)
                }
            }
            if (item.CucardaOferta != null &amp;&amp; item.CucardaOferta != '') {
                var porProduct = item.CucardaOferta;
                porProduct = porProduct.replace('%', '');
                if (porProduct.indexOf('.')) {
                    porProduct = porProduct.split('.')[0]
                }
                customItemGondolaProduct = customItemGondolaProduct.replace("%CucardaOferta%", "-" + porProduct + "%");
                customItemGondolaProduct = customItemGondolaProduct.replace('Ahorro', '');
                customItemGondolaProduct = customItemGondolaProduct.replace(/%visibility_ahorro%/g, 'block')
            } else {
                customItemGondolaProduct = customItemGondolaProduct.replace("%CucardaOferta%", '');
                customItemGondolaProduct = customItemGondolaProduct.replace(/%visibility_ahorro%/g, 'none')
            }
            if (item.PrecioKgLtr != null &amp;&amp; item.PrecioKgLtr != '') {
                customItemGondolaProduct = customItemGondolaProduct.replace(/%PrecioKgLtr%/g, item.PrecioKgLtr);
                customItemGondolaProduct = customItemGondolaProduct.replace(/%visibility_preciokgltr%/g, "hidden")
            } else {
                customItemGondolaProduct = customItemGondolaProduct.replace(/%PrecioKgLtr%/g, '');
                customItemGondolaProduct = customItemGondolaProduct.replace(/%visibility_preciokgltr%/g, "hidden")
            }
            var cucas = '';
            var cucasBanderas = '';
            if (item.Descuento_Descripcion != null &amp;&amp; item.Descuento_Descripcion != '') {
                var arTags = item.Descuento_Descripcion.split('|');                
                for (var bwnIndex = 0; bwnIndex &lt; arTags.length; bwnIndex++) {
                    customItemGondolaProduct = customItemGondolaProduct.replace("%bnwTag" + bwnIndex + "%", arTags[bwnIndex]);
                    var cucardaReplace = arTags[bwnIndex].replace(/ /g, '-').toLowerCase();

                    if (cucardaReplace.indexOf('bandera') &gt; -1|| cucardaReplace.indexOf('48horas') &gt; -1) {
                        cucasBanderas += '&lt;p class="flag '+cucardaReplace+'"&gt;&lt;/p&gt;';
                    }
                    if (cucardaReplace.indexOf('octogonal') &gt; -1){
                        cucas += '&lt;p class="flag '+cucardaReplace+'"&gt;&lt;/p&gt;';
                    }
                }
            }
            customItemGondolaProduct = customItemGondolaProduct.replace('%cucas-flags%', cucas);
            customItemGondolaProduct = customItemGondolaProduct.replace('%cucas-flags-banderas%', cucasBanderas);

            if (item.PrecioAnterior != '') {
                customItemGondolaProduct = customItemGondolaProduct.replace("%PrecioAnterior%", 'S/' + item.PrecioAnterior);
                customItemGondolaProduct = customItemGondolaProduct.replace("%visibility_descuento%", 'visible')
            } else customItemGondolaProduct = customItemGondolaProduct.replace("%visibility_descuento%", 'hidden');
            customItemGondolaProduct = customItemGondolaProduct.replace("%PrecioAnterior%", item.PrecioAnterior);
            customItemGondolaProduct = customItemGondolaProduct.replace("%title%", item.Descripcion);
            customItemGondolaProduct = customItemGondolaProduct.replace(/%Descripcion%/g, item.Descripcion);
            if (item.UnidadPrecio != null &amp;&amp; item.UnidadPrecio != '1' &amp;&amp; item.UnidadPrecio != '1.00') {
                customItemGondolaProduct = customItemGondolaProduct.replace('%unidadventa%', 'Unidad(1)= ' + item.UnidadPrecio + 'kg')
            } else {
                if (item.UnidadPrecio == null || item.UnidadPrecio == 'null') item.UnidadPrecio = 1;
                customItemGondolaProduct = customItemGondolaProduct.replace(/%pesoproduct%/g, item.UnidadPrecio);
                customItemGondolaProduct = customItemGondolaProduct.replace('%unidadventa%', '')
            }
            switch (item.PrecioKgLtrUnidad) {
                case "un":
                    customItemGondolaProduct = customItemGondolaProduct.replace(/%pesoproduct%/g, item.UnidadPrecio);
                    break;
                case "kg":
                    customItemGondolaProduct = customItemGondolaProduct.replace(/%pesoproduct%/g, item.UnidadPrecio + " kg");
                    break
            }
            itemproductTopTen += customItemGondolaProduct;
            indice++;
            if (indice == cantitems) {                
                templateGondolaProduct = templateGondolaProduct + '&lt;div&gt;&lt;ul&gt;' + itemproductTopTen + '&lt;/ul&gt;&lt;/div&gt;';
                indice = 0;        
                itemproductTopTen = '';                        
            }
        });
        if (indice &gt; 0 &amp;&amp; indice != cantitems) {
            templateGondolaProduct = templateGondolaProduct + '&lt;div&gt;&lt;ul&gt;' + itemproductTopTen + '&lt;/ul&gt;&lt;/div&gt;'
        } else if (indice &gt; 0) {
            templateGondolaProduct = templateGondolaProduct + '&lt;div class="divSliderBraindw"&gt;&lt;ul&gt;' + itemproductTopTen + '&lt;/ul&gt;&lt;/div&gt;'
        }
        templateGondolaProduct = templateGondolaProduct + '&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/section&gt;';
        return templateGondolaProduct
    }
    return ""
}

function braindw_pushInfo() {
    try {
        let _bwDataset = {};

        let _currentSessionDate = braindw_getSessionDate();
        if (_currentSessionDate) {
            _bwDataset.sessionDate = _currentSessionDate;
        }       
        // get product
        let _currentProduct = braindw_getProduct();
        if (_currentProduct) {
            _bwDataset.product = _currentProduct;
        }
        // get category 
        let _currentCategory = braindw_getCategory();
        if (_currentCategory) {
            _bwDataset.category = _currentCategory;
        }       
        // get cart 
        let _currentCartOpened = braindw_getCatOpened();
        if (_currentCartOpened) {
            _bwDataset.cartOpened = _currentCartOpened;
        }else{
            _currentCartOpened = braindw_getCatClosed();
            if (_currentCartOpened) 
                _bwDataset.cartClosed = _currentCartOpened;
        }
        // ESTO VER como hacer en vtex. NO SE SI hace falta porque te cookeas cuando te logeas
        let _emailGuest = '';
        try{
            if (Json_user != null) {
                if (Json_user.SetUser != null) {
                    if (Json_user.SetUser.UserEmail != null &amp;&amp; Json_user.SetUser.UserEmail != '') {
                        _emailGuest = Json_user.SetUser.UserEmail;
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        catch(e){}
        let braindwDataJSON = {
            emailguest: _emailGuest,
            dataset: encodeURI(JSON.stringify(_bwDataset)),
            page: '',//,document.documentElement.innerHTML,
            url: window.location.href.split('?')[0],
           // urlb: (document.querySelector('script[src*="braindw"]')) ? document.querySelector('script[src*="braindw"]').getAttribute('src') : "",
             urlb: "https://s.braindw.com/Script/braindw/metro_peru_produccion_3pcw9?",
            BranchOffice:  GetSC_Braindw()
        };

        $.ajax({
            url: "https://p.braindw.com/Api/Data/Capture",
            type: "post",
            timeout: 9000,
            data: JSON.stringify(braindwDataJSON),
            contentType: 'application/json; charset=utf-8',
            success: function (data) { },
            error: function () { },
            xhrFields: {
                withCredentials: true
            },
            crossDomain: true
        });
    }
    catch (err) {
        console.log('Error------------&gt;', err);
    }
}
function braindw_getSessionDate() {
    let result = null;
     try {
        let SalesChannel = GetSC_Braindw();
        result = {
            SalesChannel: SalesChannel,
        };
    } catch (e) {
        console.log('braindw_getSessionDate error ', e);
    }
    return result;
}
function braindw_getProduct() {
    let result = null;
    if (document.URL.indexOf('/p')==-1) return null;
    try {
        let ProductCode = "";
        let Title = "";
        let PriceOnline = "";
        let Brand = "";
        let Category = "";
        let CategoryCode = "";
        let UrlImage = "";
        let UrlProduct = window.location.href;
        if (UrlProduct.indexOf('?')&gt;-1)
        {
            UrlProduct = UrlProduct.split('?')[0];
        }
        if (typeof skuJson_0 != "undefined") {
            if (typeof skuJson_0.skus != "undefined") {
                if (skuJson_0.skus.length &gt; 0) {
                    Title = skuJson_0.skus[0].skuname;
                    UrlImage = skuJson_0.skus[0].image;
                    PriceOnline = skuJson_0.skus[0].bestPriceFormated;
                    PriceOnline = PriceOnline.replace("$","").replace("S/.", "").replace("S/", "").trim();
                }
            }
        }         
        var braindwVtx_script = $('script:contains("vtex.events.addData")').html();
        var braindwVtx_json_ld = braindwVtx_script.substring(braindwVtx_script.indexOf('{'), braindwVtx_script.lastIndexOf('}') + 1);
        if (braindwVtx_json_ld.length) {
            var braindwVtx_json_pars = JSON.parse(braindwVtx_json_ld);
            ProductCode =  braindwVtx_json_pars.productId;
            Brand = braindwVtx_json_pars.productBrandName;
            Category = braindwVtx_json_pars.productCategoryName;            
            CategoryCode = braindwVtx_json_pars.productCategoryId;          
        }
        if (ProductCode &amp;&amp; Title &amp;&amp; PriceOnline &amp;&amp; Brand &amp;&amp;
            Category &amp;&amp; CategoryCode &amp;&amp; UrlImage &amp;&amp; UrlProduct) {
            result = {
                ProductCode: ProductCode,
                Title: Title,
                PriceOnline: PriceOnline,
                Brand: Brand,
                Category: Category,
                CategoryCode: CategoryCode,
                UrlImage: UrlImage,
                UrlProduct: UrlProduct,
                BranchOffice:  GetSC_Braindw()
            }
        }
    } catch (e) {
        console.log('braindw_getProduct error ', e);
    }
    return result;
}
function GetSC_Braindw(){
    var bnwsc = '';
    ca = decodeURIComponent(document.cookie).split(';');
    for (var bnwi = 0; bnwi &lt; ca.length; bnwi++) {
        if (ca[bnwi].indexOf("VTEXSC") &gt; -1) {
            try{
                bnwsc = ca[bnwi].split('=')[2];
                if (bnwsc=='')
                    bnwsc = ca[bnwi].split('=')[1];
            }catch(e){
                bnwsc = ca[bnwi].split('=')[1];
            }
        }
    }
    return bnwsc;   
}
function braindw_getCategory() {
    let result = null;
    var braindw_url = document.URL;
    if (braindw_url.indexOf('/p')&gt;-1 &amp;&amp; braindw_url.indexOf('/cart')&gt;-1) return result;
    try {
        let Title = "";
        let CategoryCode = "";
        if (vtxctx.categoryId!=undefined) {
            CategoryCode = vtxctx.categoryId;
            Title = vtxctx.categoryName; 
        }
        if (Title &amp;&amp; CategoryCode) {
            result = {
                Title: Title,
                CategoryCode: CategoryCode
            };
        }
    } catch (e) {
        console.log('braindw_getCategory error ', e);
    }
    return result;
}

function braindw_getCatOpened() {
    let result = null;
    var braindw_url = document.URL;
    if (braindw_url.indexOf('/cart')==-1) return result;
    try {
        let CartNumber = "";
        let Items = [];
        
        let productRows = document.getElementsByClassName('product-item');
        if (productRows &amp;&amp; productRows.length &gt; 0) {
            for (let i = 0; i &lt; productRows.length; i++) {              
                if ($(productRows[i]).prop('nodeName')=='DIV')
                    Items.push(Brainwd_addCartItemDiv(productRows[i]));
                else if ($(productRows[i]).prop('nodeName')=='TR')
                    Items.push(Brainwd_addCartItemTr(productRows[i]));            
            }
        } 
        result = {
            CartNumber: CartNumber,
            BranchOffice: GetSC_Braindw(),
            Items: Items
        }
    } catch (e) {
        console.log('braindw_getCatOpened', e);
    }
    return result;
}

function Brainwd_addCartItemTr(braindw_lineCart)
{
    var imgUrl = $(braindw_lineCart).find('img').attr('src');
    var productCode =  $(braindw_lineCart).data('sku')
    var inpQuantity = $(braindw_lineCart).find('#item-quantity-' + productCode).val()
    var productTitle =  $($(braindw_lineCart).find('.product-name a')[0]).text().trim();                
    var productPriceTotal =$($(braindw_lineCart).find('.total-selling-price')).text().trim().replace(/[^\d.,-]/g, '');
    var pric =  '';
    pric = $(braindw_lineCart).find('.new-product-price').text().trim().replace(/[^\d.,-]/g, '');

    // falidar las comas 
    var cartItem = {
    ProductTitle :productTitle.trim(),
    ProductCode : productCode,
    ProductUrlImage : imgUrl,
    ProductQuantity :inpQuantity,
    ProductQuantityDetails : '',
    ProductPrice : pric,
    PriceTotal : productPriceTotal,
    Event :'Load'}

    return cartItem;    
}

function Brainwd_addCartItemDiv(braindw_lineCart)
{   
    var imgUrl = $(braindw_lineCart).find('a.product-item__image-wrapper').find('img').attr('src');
    var inpQuantity = $(braindw_lineCart).find('.product-item__cart-quantity').text().trim().replace('x','');
    var productTitle =  $(braindw_lineCart).find('.product-item__info').text().trim();              
    var productCode =  $(braindw_lineCart).data('id');
    var productPriceTotal = $($(braindw_lineCart).find('.product-item__subtotal')[0]).text().trim().replace(/[^\d.,-]/g, '');
    var productQuantityDetails =  $(braindw_lineCart).find('.product-quantity__input').val();
    // Payment
    var payments = '';
    var pric =  '';
    var pricText = '';
    var bdw_i_pre =0
    if($(braindw_lineCart).find('.product-prices__value').length&gt;1)
        bdw_i_pre = 1;
    
    try{pric = $($(braindw_lineCart).find('.product-prices__value')[bdw_i_pre]).data('price').toString();
    }catch(e){
        try{pric = $($(braindw_lineCart).find('.product-prices__value')[bdw_i_pre+1]).data('price').toString();}catch(e){}
    }
    if ((pric==undefined &amp;&amp; bdw_i_pre==1) || pric=='')
    {
        pric = $($(braindw_lineCart).find('.product-prices__value')[0]).data('price').toString();
    }   
    // validacion por si no tiene las comas o puntos.
    pricText = $($(braindw_lineCart).find('.product-prices__value')[bdw_i_pre]).html();
    if (pricText.indexOf('(')==-1 &amp;&amp; pricText.toLowerCase().indexOf('kg')==-1)
    {
        pricText = $($(braindw_lineCart).find('.product-prices__value')[bdw_i_pre]).html().replace(/[^\d.,-]/g, '');
        if (pricText.indexOf('-')&gt;-1)
        {
            pricText = pricText.split('-')[0];
        }
        if (pric!=undefined &amp;&amp; pricText!=pric.toString())
        {
            pric = pricText;
        }   
    }
    var cartItem = {
    ProductTitle :productTitle.trim(),
    ProductCode : productCode,
    ProductUrlImage : imgUrl,
    ProductQuantity :inpQuantity,
    ProductQuantityDetails : productQuantityDetails,
    ProductPrice : pric,
    PriceTotal : productPriceTotal,
    Event :'Load'}
    return cartItem;    
}

function braindw_getCatClosed() {
    let result = null;
    var braindw_url = document.URL;
    if (braindw_url.toLowerCase().indexOf('/checkout/orderconfirmation') == -1 &amp;&amp; 
        braindw_url.toLowerCase().indexOf('/checkout/orderplaced')==-1) return result;
    try {       
        let CartNumber = braindw_url.split('og=')[1];
        let Items = [];
        let productRows = document.getElementsByClassName('cconf-product bt b--light-gray');        
        if (productRows &amp;&amp; productRows.length &gt; 0) {
            for (let i = 0; i &lt; productRows.length; i++) {
                Items.push(Brainwd_addCartItemTrClosed(productRows[i]));       
            }
        } 
        else
        {
            productRows = document.getElementsByClassName('orderform-product-table__row orderform-product-table__row--body');   
            if (productRows &amp;&amp; productRows.length &gt; 0) {
                for (let i = 0; i &lt; productRows.length; i++) {
                    Items.push(Brainwd_addCartItemDivClosed(productRows[i])); 
                }
            } 
        }
        result = {
            CartNumber: CartNumber,
            Items: Items
        };
        
    } catch (e) {
        console.log('braindw_getCatClosed', e);
    }
    return result;
}

function Brainwd_addCartItemTrClosed(braindw_lineCart){
    let inpQuantity =$(braindw_lineCart).find('.pa0.pv3.v-mid')[2].textContent
    let productTitle =$($(braindw_lineCart).find('img')[0]).attr('alt').trim();
    let productCode = '';
    let imgUrl = $($(braindw_lineCart).find('img')[0]).attr('src');         
                
    // Payment
    let payments = '' ; 
    let pric = $(braindw_lineCart).find('.pa0.pv3.v-mid.dn.dtc-ns')[0].textContent.trim().replace('$', '');
    productPriceTotal = $(braindw_lineCart).find('.pa0.pv3.v-mid')[3].textContent.trim().replace('$', '');

    var cartItem = {
    ProductTitle :productTitle.trim(),
    ProductCode : productCode,
    ProductUrlImage : imgUrl,
    ProductQuantity :inpQuantity,
    ProductQuantityDetails : '',
    ProductPrice : pric,
    PriceTotal : productPriceTotal,
    Event: 'Close'}
    return cartItem;
}

function Brainwd_addCartItemDivClosed(braindw_lineCart){
    let inpQuantity =$(braindw_lineCart).find('.orderform-product-table__quantity')[0].textContent
    let productTitle =$($(braindw_lineCart).find('img')[0]).attr('alt').trim();
    let productCode = '';
    let imgUrl = $($(braindw_lineCart).find('img')[0]).attr('src');         
                
    // Payment
    let payments = '' ; 
    let pric =$(braindw_lineCart).find('.product-prices__value')[0].textContent.trim().replace('S/', '').replace('$', '');
    productPriceTotal =  $(braindw_lineCart).find('.orderform-product-table__column.orderform-product-table__column--subtotal')[0].textContent.trim().replace('S/', '').replace('$', '');

    var cartItem = {
    ProductTitle :productTitle.trim(),
    ProductCode : productCode,
    ProductUrlImage : imgUrl,
    ProductQuantity :inpQuantity,
    ProductQuantityDetails : '',
    ProductPrice : pric,
    PriceTotal : productPriceTotal,
    Event : 'Close'}
    return cartItem;    
}

});
