'.braindw_slider6_gondolaproducts .product-quantity__control--decrease.font-icn.minus.brandwdecreasedisable{width100%;}'+
'.braindw_slider6_gondolaproducts .braindw_slider6  .product-add-to-cart.braindw_addToCart .product-add-to-cart__text:last-child{display:block !important;}'+
'}'+'&lt;/style&gt;'}

function BraindwRenderBannerDynamic(data, selector,title, eventName, sufix, parentId,configs, linkImgBdw) {
    var templateGondolaProduct = "";
    data = $.grep( data, function( n, i ) {return decodeURI(document.URL).indexOf(n.Link) ===-1});
    var divsImagesAppend = ['',''];
    var linkViewMore = '';
    var cantitems = 6;
    var sliderItemWidth = 'width:14.8%;';
    var sliderConfigStyle='width: 100%; display: block; opacity: 1; margin-right:auto; margin-left:1.2%';
    var titleConfigured = '';
    var displayTitulo ='none';
    var navigationContainerWidth='';
    var styleContent= '';

    if (title != "") {
        displayTitulo ='block';
    }

    if(configs != undefined &amp;&amp; configs != null &amp;&amp; configs != "" &amp;&amp; bdwMobile.any() == null){
        styleContent= configs.Content;
        cantitems = configs.carouselItemsNum;
        sliderItemWidth = configs.sliderItemWidth;
        sliderConfigStyle = configs.sliderConfigStyle;

        for(var i = 0; i &lt; configs.imagesObjects.length ; i++){
            var img = configs.imagesObjects[i];
            divsImagesAppend[i] = BdwBuildImageObject(img.url, img.linkImg, img.imageWidth, img.marginSide, img.floatImage,img.paddingImage,img.borderRadiusImage, img.styleContent);
            divsImagesAppend[i] = divsImagesAppend[i].replace(/%eventoimg%/g,' bw-title="' + parentId +'" bw-sku="" bw-section="' + eventName +'"' );
            if (linkViewMore=='')
              linkViewMore = img.linkImg;
        }
        navigationContainerWidth=configs.navigationContainerWidth;
        if (configs.title.value==''|| configs.title.value==null)
          displayTitulo = 'none';
        else
            title=configs.title.value;
    }

    if (bdwMobile.any() != null) {
        cantitems = 2;
        sliderItemWidth = 'width:45.8%;';
        styleContent='';
    }

    
    titleConfigured = '&lt;div class="header clear-fix" style="display:' + displayTitulo + ';"&gt;'+
       '&lt;h2 class="title"&gt;&lt;span class="text braindwtxt23"&gt;'+title+'&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/h2&gt;'+
       '&lt;/div&gt;';

    if (linkViewMore=='' &amp;&amp; linkImgBdw!='')
    {
        linkViewMore=linkImgBdw;
    }

    var resto = data.length % cantitems;
    data.splice(data.length - resto, resto);

    if (data.length &gt; 0) {       

        templateGondolaProduct =            
            '&lt;section class="wrapper shop-list wfd_deparment bdw-gond-dinamic" style="margin-bottom:5px;" id="'+parentId+'"&gt;' +
              titleConfigured +
              '&lt;div class="center-bdw bdw-container-dinamic" style="'+styleContent+'"&gt;' +
                divsImagesAppend[0] +
                
            '&lt;div class="braindw_slider6_gondolaproducts" style="'+sliderConfigStyle+'" &gt;&lt;div class="braindw_slider6 '+selector+'"&gt;';

        var itemproduct =
            '&lt;li style="position: relative;'+sliderItemWidth+'"&gt;' +
            '&lt;div class="braindw_cucwm" style="display:%visibility_ahorro%"&gt;%CucardaOferta%&lt;/div&gt;' +
            '&lt;a href="%link%"  class="_braindwTriggerClick" bw-title="%Descripcion%" bw-section="'+eventName+'" bw-sku="%idcode%"&gt;&lt;div class="braindw_hflag"&gt;&lt;div class="flag %bnwTag0%"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="flag %bnwTag1%"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="flag %bnwTag2%"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/a&gt;' +
            '&lt;a class="prateleira__image-link _braindwTriggerClick" bw-title="%Descripcion%" bw-section="'+eventName+'" bw-sku="%idcode%" href="%link%"&gt;&lt;div class="prateleira__image"&gt;&lt;img src="%urlImage%"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/a&gt;' +
            
            '&lt;div class="product-item__flags"&gt;' +
                '%cucas-flags-banderas%'+
            '&lt;/div&gt;'+
            '&lt;div class="product-item__flags" style="height: 60px;"&gt;' +
                '%cucas-flags%'+
            '&lt;/div&gt;'+

            '&lt;div class="prateleira  prateleira__content"&gt;' +
            '&lt;a class="prateleira__name _braindwTriggerClick" bw-title="%Descripcion%" bw-section="'+eventName+'" bw-sku="%idcode%" href="%link%"&gt;%title%&lt;/a&gt;' +
            '&lt;a class="prateleira__marca _braindwTriggerClick" bw-title="%Descripcion%" bw-section="'+eventName+'" bw-sku="%idcode%" href="%link%"&gt;%brand%&lt;/a&gt;' +
            '&lt;a href="%link%" class="_braindwTriggerClick" bw-title="%Descripcion%" bw-section="'+eventName+'" bw-sku="%idcode%"&gt;' +
            '&lt;braindwgdif class="braindwgdifct"&gt;' +
            '&lt;div class="prateleira__list-price" style="visibility:%visibility_descuento%"&gt;Regular &lt;span&gt;%PrecioAnterior%&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/div&gt; ' +
            '&lt;div class="prateleira__best-price"&gt;Online &lt;span&gt;%price%&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/div&gt;' +
            '&lt;/braindwgdif&gt;&lt;/a&gt;' +
            '&lt;div style="visibility:%visibility_preciokgltr%"&gt;(%PrecioKgLtr% x kg)&lt;/div&gt;' +
            '&lt;/div&gt;' +

            '&lt;div class="product-item__controls" style="visibility: %visibility_nostock%"&gt;' +
            '&lt;div class="product-quantity"&gt;' +
            '&lt;input id="cantProdBwnGond-%sufix%-%idcode%" type="text" class="product-quantity__input" value="%pesoproduct%" style="%styleAgregar%" onchange="BwdInputLimitCart(this, %saleNumber%)"&gt;' +
            '&lt;input type="text" style="display:none;"&gt;' +
            '&lt;input type="text" id="brandwProductGond-%sufix%-%idcode%" value="%pesoproduct%" style="display:none;"&gt;' +
            '&lt;div class="product-quantity__controls" style="%styleAgregar2%"&gt;' +
            '&lt;button id="addProductsBwnGond-IdCode" onclick="addProductsBwnGond(%idcode%, \'%sufix%\',%saleNumber%)" class="product-quantity__control--increase font-icn plus brandwMore"&gt; &lt;/button&gt;' +
            '&lt;button id="clearProductsBwnGond-%sufix%-%idcode%" onclick="clearProductsBwnGond(%idcode%, \'%sufix%\')"  class="product-quantity__control--decrease font-icn minus brandwdecreasedisable"&gt;&lt;/button&gt;' +
            '&lt;/div&gt;' +
            '&lt;/div&gt;' +
            '&lt;button onclick="AddToMiniCartBraindGond(%AddTocart%, %idcode%,\'%sufix%\')" style="margin-left:5px;" class="product-item__add-to-cart product-add-to-cart btn add-to-cart braindw_addToCart _braindwTriggerClick" bw-title="%Descripcion%" bw-section="'+eventName+'" bw-sku="%idcode%" data-productid="%idcode%"&gt;&lt;span class="font-icn check"&gt;&lt;/span&gt;'+
            '&lt;span class="font-icn plus"&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;span class="font-icn shopping-cart"&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;span class="product-add-to-cart__text braindw-product-add-to-cart__text"&gt;Agregar&lt;/span&gt;' +
            '&lt;/button&gt;' +
            '&lt;div class="product-item__cart-amount"&gt;&lt;span class="font-icn check"&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;span class="value"&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/div&gt;' +
            '&lt;/div&gt;' +

            '&lt;/li&gt;';

        var indice = 0;
        var itemproductTopTen = '';
        
        var itemSinStock = '&lt;div class="warning" style="margin-top:-5px;"&gt;&lt;span class="font-icn attention" style="margin-top: 2px;"&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;span class="text" style="color:red;font-weight: bolder;margin-left: 2px;"&gt;Sin Stock&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/div&gt;'

        $.each(data, function(i, item) {
            var customLink = item.Link; 
            var customItemGondolaProduct = itemproduct.replace("%brand%", item.Marca);
            customItemGondolaProduct = customItemGondolaProduct.replace("%srcImageCucardaExterna%", item.Image_CucardaUrlImageExterna);
            customItemGondolaProduct = customItemGondolaProduct.replace(/%link%/g, customLink);
            customItemGondolaProduct = customItemGondolaProduct.replace("%urlImage%", item.UrlImagen);
            customItemGondolaProduct = customItemGondolaProduct.replace("%discount_description%", item.Articulo_Oferta);
            customItemGondolaProduct = customItemGondolaProduct.replace("%marca%", +item.Marca);
            customItemGondolaProduct = customItemGondolaProduct.replace(/%linkCart%/g, item.addToCart);
            customItemGondolaProduct = customItemGondolaProduct.replace(/%idcode%/g, item.IdArticulo);
            customItemGondolaProduct = customItemGondolaProduct.replace(/%AddTocart%/g, "'" + item.addToCart + "'");
            customItemGondolaProduct = customItemGondolaProduct.replace(/%sufix%/g,sufix);
            customItemGondolaProduct = customItemGondolaProduct.replace(/%saleNumber%/g, item.SaleNumber);
            if (item.PrecioKgLtr != null &amp;&amp; item.PrecioKgLtr != '') {
                customItemGondolaProduct = customItemGondolaProduct.replace("%price%", "S/" + item.PrecioKgLtr + " x kg");
                customItemGondolaProduct = customItemGondolaProduct.replace(/%Precio%/g, item.PrecioKgLtr + " x kg");
            } else {
                if (item.Precio != '0.00' &amp;&amp; item.Precio != '0') {
                    customItemGondolaProduct = customItemGondolaProduct.replace(/%visibility_nostock%/g, 'visible');
                    customItemGondolaProduct = customItemGondolaProduct.replace("%price%", "S/" + item.Precio);
                    customItemGondolaProduct = customItemGondolaProduct.replace(/%Precio%/g, item.Precio);
                } else {
                    customItemGondolaProduct = customItemGondolaProduct.replace(/%visibility_nostock%/g, 'hidden');
                    customItemGondolaProduct = customItemGondolaProduct.replace('&lt;div class="prateleira__best-price"&gt;Online &lt;span&gt;%price%&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/div&gt;', itemSinStock);
                }
            }
            if (item.CucardaOferta != null &amp;&amp; item.CucardaOferta != '') {
                var porProduct = item.CucardaOferta;
                porProduct = porProduct.replace('%', '');
                if (porProduct.indexOf('.')) {
                    porProduct = porProduct.split('.')[0]
                }
                customItemGondolaProduct = customItemGondolaProduct.replace("%CucardaOferta%", "-" + porProduct + "%");
                customItemGondolaProduct = customItemGondolaProduct.replace('Ahorro', '');
                customItemGondolaProduct = customItemGondolaProduct.replace(/%visibility_ahorro%/g, 'block');
            } else {
                customItemGondolaProduct = customItemGondolaProduct.replace("%CucardaOferta%", '');
                customItemGondolaProduct = customItemGondolaProduct.replace(/%visibility_ahorro%/g, 'none');
            }
            if (item.PrecioKgLtr != null &amp;&amp; item.PrecioKgLtr != '') {
                customItemGondolaProduct = customItemGondolaProduct.replace(/%PrecioKgLtr%/g, item.PrecioKgLtr);
                customItemGondolaProduct = customItemGondolaProduct.replace(/%visibility_preciokgltr%/g, "visible");
            } else {
                customItemGondolaProduct = customItemGondolaProduct.replace(/%PrecioKgLtr%/g, '');
                customItemGondolaProduct = customItemGondolaProduct.replace(/%visibility_preciokgltr%/g, "hidden");
            }

            var cucas = '';
            var cucasBanderas = '';
            if (item.Descuento_Descripcion != null &amp;&amp; item.Descuento_Descripcion != '') {
                var arTags = item.Descuento_Descripcion.split('|');                
                for (var bwnIndex = 0; bwnIndex &lt; arTags.length; bwnIndex++) {
                    customItemGondolaProduct = customItemGondolaProduct.replace("%bnwTag" + bwnIndex + "%", arTags[bwnIndex]);
                    var cucardaReplace = arTags[bwnIndex].replace(/ /g, '-').toLowerCase();
                    if (cucardaReplace.indexOf('bandera') &gt; -1|| cucardaReplace.indexOf('48horas') &gt; -1) {
                        cucasBanderas += '&lt;p class="flag '+cucardaReplace+'"&gt;&lt;/p&gt;';
                    }
                    if (cucardaReplace.indexOf('octogonal') &gt; -1){
                        cucas += '&lt;p class="flag '+cucardaReplace+'"&gt;&lt;/p&gt;';
                    }
                }
            }
            customItemGondolaProduct = customItemGondolaProduct.replace('%cucas-flags%', cucas);
            customItemGondolaProduct = customItemGondolaProduct.replace('%cucas-flags-banderas%', cucasBanderas);

            if (item.PrecioAnterior != '') {
                customItemGondolaProduct = customItemGondolaProduct.replace("%PrecioAnterior%", 'S/' + item.PrecioAnterior);
                customItemGondolaProduct = customItemGondolaProduct.replace("%visibility_descuento%", 'visible');
            } else
                customItemGondolaProduct = customItemGondolaProduct.replace("%visibility_descuento%", 'hidden');

            customItemGondolaProduct = customItemGondolaProduct.replace("%PrecioAnterior%", item.PrecioAnterior);
            customItemGondolaProduct = customItemGondolaProduct.replace("%title%", item.Descripcion);
            customItemGondolaProduct = customItemGondolaProduct.replace(/%Descripcion%/g, item.Descripcion);

            if (item.UnidadPrecio != null &amp;&amp; item.UnidadPrecio != '1' &amp;&amp; item.UnidadPrecio != '1.00') {
                customItemGondolaProduct = customItemGondolaProduct.replace('%unidadventa%', 'Unidad(1)= ' + item.UnidadPrecio + 'kg');
            } else {
                if (item.UnidadPrecio == null || item.UnidadPrecio == 'null') item.UnidadPrecio = 1;
                customItemGondolaProduct = customItemGondolaProduct.replace(/%pesoproduct%/g, item.UnidadPrecio);
                customItemGondolaProduct = customItemGondolaProduct.replace('%unidadventa%', '');
            }

            switch (item.PrecioKgLtrUnidad) {
                case "un":
                    customItemGondolaProduct = customItemGondolaProduct.replace(/%pesoproduct%/g, item.UnidadPrecio);
                    break;
                case "kg":
                    customItemGondolaProduct = customItemGondolaProduct.replace(/%pesoproduct%/g, item.UnidadPrecio + " kg");
                    break;
            }
            
            itemproductTopTen += customItemGondolaProduct;
            indice++;
            if (indice == cantitems) {
                templateGondolaProduct = templateGondolaProduct + '&lt;div class="group-item"&gt;&lt;ul&gt;' + itemproductTopTen + '&lt;/ul&gt;&lt;/div&gt;';
                indice = 0;        
                itemproductTopTen = '';
            }
        });

        if (indice &gt; 0 &amp;&amp; indice != cantitems) {
            templateGondolaProduct = templateGondolaProduct + '&lt;div&gt;&lt;ul&gt;' + itemproductTopTen + '&lt;/ul&gt;&lt;/div&gt;';
        }
        if (divsImagesAppend[1] !=undefined) {
            templateGondolaProduct = templateGondolaProduct + '&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;'+divsImagesAppend[1] +'&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/section&gt;';    
        }else
            templateGondolaProduct = templateGondolaProduct + '&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/section&gt;';
        

        templateGondolaProduct = templateGondolaProduct + '&lt;div&gt;%divButtonViewMore%&lt;/div&gt;';
        if (linkViewMore!='' &amp;&amp; bdwMobile.any()){
          templateGondolaProduct = templateGondolaProduct.replace('%divButtonViewMore%', '&lt;div class="row events-category-box-bottom" style="border-radius: 5px;text-align:center;background:#ffda00;color:#fff;width: 80%;margin: auto;padding: 5px;"&gt;&lt;span style=""&gt;&lt;a style="color:#060606" href="' + linkViewMore + '"&gt;VER MÁS&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/div&gt;');      
          templateGondolaProduct = templateGondolaProduct.replace(/%sectionEvent%/g, eventName); 
        }
        else
        {
          templateGondolaProduct = templateGondolaProduct.replace('%divButtonViewMore%','');
        }
        templateGondolaProduct += braindwStyle();
        if(configs != undefined &amp;&amp; configs != null &amp;&amp; configs != "" &amp;&amp; bdwMobile.any() == null){
            templateGondolaProduct= templateGondolaProduct.replace(/%left-percent%/g,configs.controlsStylePrev);
            templateGondolaProduct= templateGondolaProduct.replace(/%right-percent%/g,configs.controlsStyleNext);
            templateGondolaProduct= templateGondolaProduct.replace(/%braindw_id_gondola%/g,parentId);
        }
        
        return templateGondolaProduct;
    }
    return "";
}

function BraindwGetCapture(code, title, link, image, iscart, price){
    try{
        var url = 'https://' + document.URL.split('/')[2] + '/api/catalog_system/pub/products/search'
        $.ajax({
            url: url ,
            dataType: 'json',
            cache: false,
            async: true,
            timeout: 9000,
            data: 'fq=productId:' + code +'&amp;sc=' + bdwGetSucCookie(),      
            success: function (data) {
                try{
                    var bdw_arbol_product_clusters ='';
                    var clusters = data[0].productClusters;
                    var clusterArray = Object.keys(clusters).map((key) =&gt; [key, clusters[key]]);
                    var clusterId="";
                    for (var i=0;i&lt;clusterArray.length;i++)
                    {
                        clusterId = clusterArray[i];
                        bdw_arbol_product_clusters += 'cl_'+clusterId[0]+",";
                    }
                    categoryArray = data[0].categoriesIds[0].slice(1,-1).split("/");
                    for (var i=0; i&lt;categoryArray.length; i++)
                    {
                        bdw_arbol_product_clusters += categoryArray[i] + ",";
                    }     
                    braindw_cpname = data[0].categories[0].substring(1).split("/")[0];                       
                    var o = document.createElement("script");
                    o.async = !0, o.src = 'https://s.braindw.com/tracking/capture?HASH=metro_peru_produccion_3pcw9&amp;og:title=' + title + '&amp;og:image=' + image + '&amp;og:url=' + link + '&amp;og:categorypcode=&amp;og:category=&amp;og:categorycode=&amp;og:codeproduct='+code+ "&amp;og:categoriescodes="  + bdw_arbol_product_clusters + code + "&amp;iscart=" + iscart + '&amp;og:brand=&amp;og:price=' + price + '&amp;og:pricesale=&amp;og:priceold=&amp;og:promotion=&amp;hs=' + new Date, o.charset = "UTF-8", document.head.appendChild(o);
                }
                catch(e){}
            },
            error: function (xhr, ajaxOptions, thrownError) {}
        });
    }catch (e) { console.log(e) }     
}
//home dinamic
function braindwStartCarousel(gondola) {
    $('.'+gondola).bxSlider({
        mode: 'horizontal',
        captions: true,
        moveSlides: 1,
        controls: true,
        nextText: '',
        prevText: ''

    });
 
}

function BdwBuildImageObject(urlImage, linkImage, widthImage, marginSideImage, floatImage,paddingImage, borderRadiusImage){
    return '&lt;div class="_braindw_item_image _braindwTriggerClick" style="width: '+widthImage+';'+marginSideImage+';float: '+floatImage+';padding: '+paddingImage+';" %eventoimg% &gt;&lt;a href="'+linkImage+'"&gt;&lt;img src="'+urlImage+'" style="max-width: 100%;'+borderRadiusImage+'"&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/div&gt;';
}

var bdwMobile = {
 Android: function() {
   return navigator.userAgent.match(/Android/i);
 },
 BlackBerry: function() {
   return navigator.userAgent.match(/BlackBerry/i);
 },
 iOS: function() {
   return navigator.userAgent.match(/iPhone|iPad|iPod/i);
 },
 Opera: function() {
   return navigator.userAgent.match(/Opera Mini/i);
 },
 Windows: function() {
   return navigator.userAgent.match(/IEMobile/i);
 },
 any: function() {
   return (bdwMobile.Android() || bdwMobile.BlackBerry() || bdwMobile.iOS() || bdwMobile.Opera() || bdwMobile.Windows());
 }
};
 try{ console.log('[abtest 0] [usertest ]'); } catch(e) {console.log('error load abtest log')}</script>

$(".product-add-to-cart--product-view.product-add-to-cart.add-to-cart").on("click",function(){console.log("GTM---PXL-DPA: "+$(this).parent().parent().parent().find("#___rc-p-sku-ids").attr("value")+" --- "+$(this).parent().parent().parent().find(".productName").text());fbq("track","AddToCart",{content_name:$(this).parent().parent().parent().find(".productName").text(),content_ids:[$(this).parent().parent().parent().find("#___rc-p-sku-ids").attr("value")],content_type:"product"})});
$(".product-item__action--quickview").on("click",function(){console.log("PXL-DPA---Quickview: "+$(this).parent().parent().parent().attr("data-sku")+" --- "+$(this).parent().parent().parent().find(".product-item__name").attr("title"));fbq("track","ViewContent",{content_name:$(this).parent().parent().parent().find(".product-item__name").attr("title"),content_ids:[$(this).parent().parent().parent().attr("data-sku")],content_type:"product"});localStorage.setItem("sku-prod",$(this).parent().parent().parent().attr("data-sku"));
localStorage.setItem("name-prod",$(this).parent().parent().parent().find(".product-item__name").attr("title"))});</script><iframe src="https://metrope.os.tc/webPushIframe" sandbox="allow-popups allow-popups-to-escape-sandbox allow-same-origin allow-scripts allow-top-navigation" style="display: none;"></iframe><div id="onesignal-popover-container" class="onesignal-popover-container onesignal-reset slide-down"><div id="onesignal-popover-dialog" class="onesignal-popover-dialog"><div id="normal-popover"><div class="popover-body"><div class="popover-body-icon"><img class="" src="https://wongfood.vteximg.com.br/arquivos/logo-metro-192_192.png" /></div><div class="popover-body-message">¡Queremos mostrarte notificaciones de nuestras novedades y descuentos exclusivos!</div><div class="clearfix"></div></div><div class="popover-footer"><button id="onesignal-popover-allow-button" class="align-right primary popover-button">si</button><button id="onesignal-popover-cancel-button" class="align-right secondary popover-button">no gracias</button><div class="clearfix"></div></div></div></div></div></body></html>
